channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NM

item.title: Report X-2023091091
item.description:
Report X-2023091091

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-27T18:13:30+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-13
  • City: ALBUQUERQUE
  • State: NM
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: HAZMAT WAS BROUGHT TO QA FROM UNLOAD, AFTER INSPECTING PACKAGE I FOUND IT WAS LEAKING AND PLACED IN HAZMAT BAG AND DRUM. DescribePack: UPON INSPECTION I FOUND IT WAS LEAKING FROM LOOSE OR CRACKED CAP. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: AFTER FINDING WHERE IT WAS LEAKING FROM THE PACKAGE WAS PLACED IN HAZMAT DRUM.
